mapper.select: SELECT id FROM hm_rider_order WHERE FROM_UNIXTIME(ctime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') > DATE_SUB( FROM_UNIXTIME( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE ) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(ctime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_SUB( FROM_UNIXTIME( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ), INTERVAL 15 MINUTE ) AND pay_status = 0
